title: Skyblock: Unlimited!
briefDescription: Welcome to Skyblock: Unlimited! This world is based off of the original Skyblock, but with one goal. Your goal is to have fun! No need ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Welcome to Skyblock: Unlimited! This world is based off of the original Skyblock, but with one goal. Your goal is to have fun! No need to kill the Ender Dragon or the Wither. All you need to do is expand your island to achieve the best island in Skyblock history!
While you explore your island, you may notice some Shulker boxes underneath your island! What does it mean?! Those Shulker boxes consist of items that will increase your chances of survival! Not only that, but one box consist of brand new blocks to use on your builds! This will add a whole new look to your island. However, your resources are limited, so use them wisely. Also, I may have added a bit more detail to the island, so I hope you enjoy it!

title: P.V.E. SKY SURVIVAL
briefDescription: In this map you have to kill mobs for you survival. The map comes with an addon which changes the loot tables of the mobs ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
In this map you have to kill mobs for you survival. The map comes with an addon which changes the loot tables of the mobs and makes the ender dragon fight possible. It is a hard skyblock challenge so you can bring friends to help you, as the map is multiplayer friendly. It also has a spawn, custom items, and a mob called loot chicken which will help you progress faster.
Every island has a spawner, so get blocks and start expanding.
The custom items:
Shop:

title: Skycubes: Summer Update
briefDescription: In some places, its summer. Well, we released 1.2 with nether and aquatic mix! We also created Nether Skycubes with 9 cubes to explore. Try this version ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
In some places, its summer. Well, we released 1.2 with nether and aquatic mix! We also created Nether Skycubes with 9 cubes to explore. Try this version for a summer experience!
This map contains 98 different cubes to explore! Some are tiny, some are large, and some are just normal! Here is overview of skycubes.

A small cube size is just 5?5 (inside the cube). These cubes mostly contains farms, trees, some resources, and even a treasure and gifts! Some small cubes has a cobblestone generator or a broken nether portal. One more thing, more than half of the cubed in the map are these cubes.
Normal-sized Cubes

The spawn is a normal cube, mean it?s size is 10?10 (inside cube). A normal cube always contains only one biome, and some of the normal cube has even structures that fill inside a 10?10 cube (like dungeons and igloos) I also added 4 new normal-sized cubes, contains structures!
Large Cube

Large cubes are the biggest type of cubes, which twice the size of a normal cube. There are only four large cubes, which has a plains biome, a jungle biome, a jungle temple, the old and new village, a stronghold, a mineshaft, pillager outpost, and two dungeons.
Microcube is the newest cube in the map. The map only has 3?3 (inside) and it commonly contains chest with loot, or rarely random blocks. There is 16 microcubes around the map.
After entering the nether, you?ll get a chest with similar loot when you start on Skycubes.

The dimension currently has 9 cubes and surrounded by a bedrock barrier.
New cubes is aquatic-related and some has loot inside on it.
It?s a library which contains articles from Skybooks, enchantment books, and the book history of Skycubes.
There is a fictional book publisher called Skybooks and there is also a lectern for the book for the update.
Here?s an example of an article from Skycubes:

title: Captive Minecraft
briefDescription: Most of you should know what Captive Minecraft is but for those who don't it is a game where you are stuck in a 1 x 1 ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Most of you should know what Captive Minecraft is but for those who don?t it is a game where you are stuck in a 1 x 1 and the only way to expand it is to complete an achievement. Once you complete every achievement you will then be set free from your prison.
There are a few structures you can find underground as well as 2 custom enemies.
There is an ?Achievement Book? that you will get once you start the map that will help aid you in your captivity.
This map is multiplayer friendly so join and invite your friends!

title: Epic Survival House with Bunker
briefDescription: Do you want to do a survival but you don't want to build a house?Do you want a house to live with your friends?...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Do you want to do a survival but you don?t want to build a house?
Do you want a house to live with your friends?
Well, this might be the map you are looking for.
Includes bedrooms, jacuzzi, a pool, a path, a really big bunker and more.
Watch the trailer!
Note: the shaders used in the screenshot are Natural Mystic Shaders (download here). Shader pack not included with the world.
All the blue words are links, feel free to click them for more info.
This house might look small, but it has a huge bunker. Perfect for survival and multiplayer, have fun surviving Minecraft in this epic house. Built by the BrawlCraft Team: ZarMask Plus and FranProZ. The house has two floors.
In the first floor, there is a bedroom with two beds.
Also, there is a jacuzzi.
Outside, you can see a pool.
In the bunker there are potato crops and beetroot crops.
There is also a room full of chests and furnaces.

title: Alien Isolation (First Half)
briefDescription: A detailed fan-made Minecraft adventure-Map based on the game 'Alien Isolation' by SEGA etc.Because of true to detailed locations and lighting, ambient sound and ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
A detailed fan-made Minecraft adventure-Map based on the game ?Alien Isolation? by SEGA etc.
Because of true to detailed locations and lighting, ambient sound and tense storyline, this world provides a good recreation of the actual game.
For Minecraft Bedrock edition on mobile devices (like a mobile version of Alien Isolation:) )
IMPORTANT: The map doesn?t seem to work on x-box right now. You could try it out anyways, if you have knowledge about how to install mc maps on your own.
Additional Informations:
Inventar:
During the storyline you will also get:
Help:
You can try different Playthroughs:
f.e. reaching the fright lift in Gemini-Exoplanet-Solutions without killing anyone
Additionally there are some hidden actions:
f.e. After saving in the Coolant Floor (Medical facility) take the elevator back to San Christobal and check for some people left (Sedation Ward??!)
Maybe I will add an update with the added Project KG 348 to bring this half to an acceptable end at some point!
Good luck and entertainment!

And she?s challenging you to visit her cellar

This map is based on the original game of SLENDRINA THE CELLAR created by DVloper

title: Skyblock 1.16 V1.0
briefDescription: 1.16 has just been released by Mojang to the Bedrock community, and if you do not like the lag of servers, but yet love Skyblock, this ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
1.16 has just been released by Mojang to the Bedrock community, and if you do not like the lag of servers, but yet love Skyblock, this is the map for you! I will add updates weekly, and please report any bugs or suggest islands in comments! New islands like the Mooshroom and Jungle islands getting added soon! (I just wanna keep the enthusiasm up dont flame me)
This might seem like a normal Skyblock map, but theres where you are wrong! It has many unique features, like custom islands, a end/nether island (!), villager workstations (!), and a miner?s cube (!), a full beacon setup (!), hidden diamond blocks on an island (!), and a farm island (!). This is also without any sort of chests in the map, but trust me you will suceed. The aim is to kill the ender dragon, and thus beating the game. FYI in the Miner?s cube there is only 7 iron, (hint: one for flint and steel, three for a pick, and three for a bucket!) and other limitations and challenges, so I hope you give me suggestions for islands and report anything missing! Thanks! Oh yes, NO PUBLISHING MY MAP ANYWHERE ELSE Thanks! (hint: breed villagers for more!)

crawledImageUrls.text: Are you bored with finding sky block maps? Biomes Skyblocks will definitely not disappoint you (or not?) Hope you like it. This is just the beginning of my map making it for you to try for the first time. Hope you enjoy!

title: Call of Duty Zombies ? Out West Mine V6
briefDescription: Zombies Map Inspired by the Call of Duty Zombies Franchise. Try to survive for as long as possible in a Round based Zombie Survival Map!...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Zombies Map Inspired by the Call of Duty Zombies Franchise. Try to survive for as long as possible in a Round based Zombie Survival Map!
Includes:
-Revive System: Supports up to 8 Players!
-All Purchases are based on tapping on item frames!
-Points and rounds are based on rotten flesh drops! Don?t be discouraged if you aren?t getting points or if the rounds aren?t changing! Your zombies simply still haven?t dropped flesh!
-Try to solve the Main Quest! (EE)
-Tutorials are now being uploaded!
Link to Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCrmyVb1YEVCv2jqRNGWkEbg
Warning!: Map may still have some bugs I have not yet Fixed, let me know of any you encounter!
Make a copy of the original to play again!
DO NOT Change simulation distance
-Powerups!

Zombies have a chance to drop unique Power Ups! Picking these up can result in doubling the amount of points you get per zombie, increase your damage output, and even free points for you and your team mates.

-Buyable Doors
Spend your Points on doors around the map to unlock new areas and explore new places! Buying doors gives you access to more items around the map to enhance your gameplay!

-Perks
A total of 4 perks are located around the map that will each give you different potion effects to assist you in your survival! These include Resistance, Health Boost, Speed, and Regeneration. Don?t forget to turn on the power first!
-Wall Weapons

-Rotating Mystery Box!
Find the mystery box and buy it in order to receive a random weapon, equipment, or even something else! Open the Box when numbers appear on your screen to pick up your item, if you don?t pick it up before the timer ends, you will lose that item! Sometimes the mystery box will move to a different location rather than giving you an item!

-Traps
Find Sea Lanterns on item frames to find a trap! These will kill any zombies and players who enter its area of effect!

-Progressive Difficulty Rounds!
Survive multiple rounds of zombies and try to reach the highest round you possibly can! Rounds are based on rotten flesh drops, once a certain number of zombies have dropped flesh, the next round will begin!

-Enchanter
Turn on power and stand on the teleporter to go to the enchanter! You will be teleported back to the map after a full minute passes! Each player may only access the enchanter once per round after power has been turned on!

-Buildables!
Find Repeating Command blocks and throw all the pieces specified to craft items! Craft a repairable free shield and a 2000 Point Iron Golem! Pieces for these items can be found scattered across the map and even in some hidden areas!

title: House for 2 Friends [Creation]
briefDescription: Did you wanted to start surviving with a friend, but was it too hard? Then we have prepared for you a small starting house with ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Did you wanted to start surviving with a friend, but was it too hard? Then we have prepared for you a small starting house with different possibilities! Do not worry, these are not cheats. This is just a small house.
This house can be called a small base, because it contains everything for a comfortable stay in the world of Minecraft! But the greatest joy is that the base is for two people. Thus, it is convenient to play together and, accordingly, much more fun! It would seem a simple house, but there is an underground warehouse, a small garden, two towers, a small animal farm and not only. A favorable location, namely in an empty area, will be very cool to defend against evil mobs!

title: Call of Duty Zombies ? Deep Woods V2
briefDescription: Map Based on the Call of Duty Zombies Franchise! Try your best to survive as long as possible on this round based survival map! Try ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Map Based on the Call of Duty Zombies Franchise! Try your best to survive as long as possible on this round based survival map! Try Out my other Zombie Maps which have even more unique features!
Includes:
Revive System that supports up to 8 players!
Points! Based on rotten flesh drops! so don?t be discouraged if you aren?t getting points! just keep killing zombies!
Full length EE! Escape the map!
-Wall Buys
Purchase wall buys to Assist you in fending off hordes of undead! Price is specified on the sign below!

-Buyable Doors
Tap on doors to unlock new areas of the map! It costs points though!

-Perks
There are 3 perks scattered around the map! Find and buy all of them to help you slay the undead! Don?t forget to turn on the power!

-Mystery Box
Spin the mystery box for weapons and equipment! Hope it doesn?t get sent to another location!

-Rounds
Rounds are based on rotten flesh drops and not on zombie kills! Don?t be discouraged if the rounds aren?t changing! you simply need to kill more zombies!

-Craftable Shield!
Find all the pieces to craft the shield! It has a unique ability!

-Powerup Drops
Killing Zombies has a chance of spawning a powerup drop! Pick them up to enhance your gameplay!

-Enchanter
Find out how to unlock the enchanter to make your weapons more powerful!

-Easter Egg!
Solve the Easter egg to escape the map!

title: Braeden?s Advanced Skyblock
briefDescription: This is a new skyblock map I made that has better islands, items, stuff, etc. than my last one. Most of the islands still have ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is a new skyblock map I made that has better islands, items, stuff, etc. than my last one. Most of the islands still have the same concept but I made them look way better in my opinion.
In my newest skyblock map, You can do a bunch of stuff! you can go to the nether, enchant, make potions, and even go to the end. I know in my last map The End was a bit messed up, so I fixed it. And I also made the Islands on this map look like they came out right from the ground, which adds a great aesthetic.
Tip: in order to get eyes of ender you have to trade for them through a cleric villager, which I provided. There?s already 3 eyes of ender in the portal room. You get blaze rods from a blaze spawner in The Nether

title: Braeden?s Skyblock
briefDescription: This is a survival skyblock map I made that has a lot of islands with a bunch of stuff! You can enchant, you can make ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is a survival skyblock map I made that has a lot of islands with a bunch of stuff! You can enchant, you can make potions, you can go to the nether, and you can even go to the end!
Hey all, this is the first map I?ve ever made and im quite proud of it. This skyblock is more advanced than the normal skyblock everyone knows and loves. You can bridge to different islands for a bunch of unique stuff! You can either play single player or with friends!
